entry.title: [Global][Public Cloud] MKS upgrades of all managed cluster with an update policy set to ALWAYS UPDATE or to MAXIMUM SECURITY to the latest available patch version.
entry.content:
Dec 14, 10:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 12, 22:24 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/12/2022 10:00 UTC
End time : 16/12/2022 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : This maintenance is scheduled to upgrade all clusters with a policy update configured by the customer to ALWAYS UPDATE (through the API Ovhcloud console) or to MAXIMUM SECURITY (through the Manager UI interface). 
With this maintenance, we will upgrade all concerned MKS services to the latest patch version provided by our team. For more details, please refer to the documentation.

entry.title: [EU][Public Cloud] - IP Block operations
entry.content:
Dec 14, 08:55 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/12/2022 14:00
End Time : 14/12/2022 05:00
Root cause : An ongoing operation caused the delay observed
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 13, 16:44 UTC
Update - Our technical teams identified that the degradation had also affected the public network and all the operations around the IP blocks (purchase, removal etc.).

Dec 13, 16:23 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 13/12/2022 14:00
Service impact :Add/Remove of ipblock from vrack can take long times to be performed.
Ongoing Actions:Our technical teams investigate to determine the origin of the degradation
